A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm completely confused by all of the negativity surrounding this movie. The Last Jedi was an incredible installment of the Star Wars saga. The acting was excellent\, the cinematography was stunning\, and the writing was perhaps the most daring and original of any Star Wars film yet. I've been a lifelong Star Wars fan and not only does this movie do justice to the Star Wars universe\, it was everything I hoped for and more.
